item.title: 实现proxy
item.description: TCP Socket Connect through HTTP Proxy http://www.example-code.com/csharp/socket_http_proxy.asp http://www.chilkatsoft.com/downloads_DotNet.asp Socket/SSL/TLS through SOCKS5 / SOCKS4 Proxy http://www.example-code.com/csharp/socket_socks_proxy.asp https://github.com/niik/switchboard https://github.com/X-rus/xNet https://github.com/krys-g/TrotiNet https://github.com/gja/LightProxy ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| .net 4.0 task 多任务 webclient proxy socket 第三方插件实现 ============================================================ http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4898339/how-to-check-if-a-proxy-server-is-configured HttpWebRequest WebProxy C# Connecting Through Proxy – Stack Overflow http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1938990/c-sharp-connecting-through-proxy c# – MultiThreaded Proxy Checker – Stack Overflow http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6235651/multithreaded-proxy-checker multithreading – C# Multithreaded Proxy Checker – Stack Overflow http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3132178/c-sharp-multithreaded-proxy-checker Chilkat Tech Notes
